summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the purchase of certain property and property rights in Skagit County for a right of way for a transmission system, in accordance with the plan or system specified and adopted in Ordinance No. 36852 as amended, and Ordinance No. 42495, for the making of certain additions, betterments and extensions of the municipal street railway system, making an appropriation therefor, and declaring an emergency.
